title: Getting Excited For The Playoffs
teaser: Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca weighs in on the race to the World Series.
contentencoded:
The race to the World Series is barrelling ahead, and Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca is among the excited fans.

“All the stuff that’s boring over 162 games — like a pitcher staring at a runner, so he doesn’t run — it gets exciting and intense during the playoffs,” Pesca tells Robin Young.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst. He tweets @pescami.
